description: Main source file for a Flutter application that sets up the main widget, theme, and initial UI structure.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with title parameter.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage managing the UI build method.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, runs MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
